name: Scotland
legal_system: Separate Scottish legal system under Private Housing (Tenancies) (Scotland) Act 2016

notice_procedures: Notice to Leave + First-tier Tribunal application

legacy_tenancies.note: Still exist but no new PRTs created

minimum_notice_periods.28_days: Grounds 1 (rent arrears if arrears at notice), 3 (ASB), 9 (overcrowding), 11 (not occupying), 12 (criminal conviction), 13 (mortgage - if lender applying), 18 (false statement)
minimum_notice_periods.84_days: Most other grounds including 4 (landlord to live), 5 (sell), 6 (refurbishment), 7 (HMO), 8 (non-residential), 10, 13 (mortgage - if landlord applying), 14 (religious), 15 (care), 16 (temporary employment), 17 (former employee)

first_tier_tribunal.name: Housing and Property Chamber
first_tier_tribunal.application: After Notice to Leave period expires
first_tier_tribunal.discretion: Full discretion on all grounds (no mandatory grounds)

grounds.note: No mandatory grounds - Tribunal has discretion on all

tribunal_system.tribunal: First-tier Tribunal for Scotland (Housing and Property Chamber)
tribunal_system.application_fee: Free for tenants, modest fees for landlords
tribunal_system.process: Paper application, case management discussion, hearing if needed
tribunal_system.eviction_order: Issued by Tribunal, executed by sheriff officers

key_sections: Mandatory steps before rent arrears eviction

deposit_protection.deadline: 30 working days from start of tenancy
deposit_protection.cap: No statutory cap (but must be reasonable)

landlord_registration.penalty: Cannot evict if not registered, potential prosecution

hmo_licensing.penalty: Cannot let without license, prosecution risk

tenant_protections.open_ended_tenancy: No fixed end date - security of tenure
tenant_protections.grounds_only: Can only evict on statutory grounds

penalties_for_misuse.ground_4_penalty: Up to 6 months' rent if re-let within 3 months of claiming landlord to occupy
penalties_for_misuse.ground_5_penalty: Up to 6 months' rent if not marketed within 3 months of claiming intent to sell
